0.title: Valorant App
0.description: Using the Valorant API, I developed an application that contains all the agents, weapons, and maps that can be found in the game. Each page has a unique functionality.

1.title: Villa Petite Fleur
1.description: I create the website for Villa Petite Fleur, a guest house located near the CDG airport. The website is designed to be simple and to list all the facilities and information about the guest house and its surroundings.

2.title: YUME
2.description: YUME is a full-stack project created during my semester in Japan. I wanted to develop a web application for couples and friends to get to know each other better through questions and quizzes.

3.title: Etudate
3.description: Etudate is a dating app designed for students. It is a full-stack group project.

4.title: Guess My RGB
4.description: Guess My RGB is a game where you try to find the correct RGB combination to win. It uses probability laws to help determine the final color.

5.title: Thomas was alone
5.description: This project is inspired by the platform game Thomas Was Alone.
